title: A Quick Thank You to Porocles and Broporo
body:
_This isn't for RP- already had my share. _

This is just to tell you guys that you guys are awesome. My snow down shop gave me Project: Katarina so I just felt like drawing in this theme. 
When I run into a problem or question, I look for posts with the comments you guys wrote, and it helps most of the time. 
**Thank you so much Porocles and Broporo, keep up the good work, and have a nice day :) **



                                                                                                                                                                                                                               ~~Poro is wearing Adidas sneakers btw~~

replies.body:
Hey, grats on your shop goodies!  Thank you for the kind words and drawing!  You know Broporo and I love this community, and we're grateful that we can be available to you all on the boards.  You guys are the best!  <3

~~~Interesting coincidence so am I :P~~~
